abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of this project would be
            to increase the efficiency and security of civil aviation in
            Peru and improve service to the eastern jungle and jungle
            highland regions, which currently have poor transport links
            with the rest of the country. This would be accomplished
            through: (i) the improvement of three regional airports and
            construction of a fourth; (ii) provision on a nation-wide
            basis of communications, navigational and other aviation
            equipment including a flight inspection aircraft; and (iii)
            final engineering for the project airports and for a new
            airport at Cuzco and technical assistance for CORPAC. This
            project faces no special risks.
